references.paper_title: VL-SAT: Visual-linguistic semantics assisted training for 3d semantic scene graph prediction in point cloud
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for generating 3D semantic scene graphs from point clouds, which is a crucial component of the 3DGraphLLM method.

references.paper_title: Open3dsg: Open-vocabulary 3d scene graphs from point clouds with queryable objects and open-set relationships
references.reason: This paper introduces a new open-vocabulary 3D scene graph dataset and benchmark, which is used for evaluating 3DGraphLLM's performance.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical open-vocabulary 3d scene graphs for language-grounded robot navigation
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the use of hierarchical scene graphs for robot navigation, which is a related task to 3D scene understanding and is relevant to the 3DGraphLLM approach.

references.paper_title: Language-grounded dynamic scene graphs for interactive object search with mobile manipulation
references.reason: This paper shows the application of dynamic scene graphs for interactive object search, highlighting the real-time capabilities of scene graph representations, which is a relevant aspect to the 3DGraphLLM system.

references.paper_title: ScanRefer: 3d object localization in rgb-d scans using natural language
references.reason: This paper introduces the ScanRefer dataset, a widely used benchmark for 3D vision-language tasks, which is one of the datasets used for evaluating 3DGraphLLM.
